alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:25PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Nassau, north central Clay and Duval Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 225 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cecil Field, or 9 miles west of Orange Park, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Unf, Arlington, Middleburg, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Baymeadows, Ortega and San Pablo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval
